SourceString: Would you like to escape from the \n dungeon with Riremito? \n<yesno><break>
{Character_Name} used the tin from my memory!
{Character_Name} tried using the tin of his memories as a \n tool.
Would you like to escape from the \n dungeon with Riremito? \n<yesno><break>
But it was drowned out by a mysterious power! \n<end>
I will now escape from the dungeon. \nAre you sure? \n<yesno><close>
